name: Big and Juicy Burger
description: A classic, juicy beef burger topped with fresh lettuce, tomatoes, and a flavorful sauce.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: A rich and hearty Italian pasta dish with a savory tomato and meat sauce.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: A delicious pizza topped with fresh basil, mozzarella, and a flavorful tomato sauce.

name: Fluffy Pancakes
description: Soft, buttery pancakes served with maple syrup and fresh berries.

name: Caesar Salad
description: A crisp and refreshing salad with romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, and creamy Caesar dressing.

name: Grilled Chicken
description: Tender and juicy grilled chicken breast seasoned to perfection.

name: Sushi Rolls
description: Delicate sushi rolls filled with fresh fish, rice, and vegetables.

name: Tomato Soup
description: A warm and comforting tomato soup with a hint of basil and cream.

name: Burger and Fries
description: A classic combo of a juicy burger served with crispy golden fries.
